RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Ph.D, Giovanni Maria Conti is currently the Coordinator of Knitwear design Lab ? Knitlab of the Fashion Design Degree at the Politecnico di Milano. His fields of interest are focused on contemporary design with a specialization on Knitwear and Fashion Design. In 2008, he started his career as Assistant Professor at School of Design, Politecnico di Milano; he be-gan teaching History of Fashion Design and Knitwear design. Especially in that new area of fashion de-sign, he researched at the same time, from the point of view of the materials, the typical techniques and technologies of this sector. His didactical approach to Knitwear Design is radically different from the traditional method. Based neither on the history of art philology nor on the arts and crafts point of view but on considering knitwear as a system where each component ? project, production, distribution, communication - should be considered as part of the whole system and consequently enter in the design process. This approach has been recognized as an academical innovation and as a very good job opportuni-ty for his students that are consequently welcome to work for the knitwear industry. Thanks to this vision the most relevant Italian and International knitwear brands are now partners of the Politecnico Knitwear Design Course: Missoni, Loro Piana, Zegna Baruffa Lane Borgosesia, Filmar. Moreover in this area of fashion design, two year ago, he founded the blog/web platform www.knitlab.org

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Membro Scientific Consulting Comittee della Rivista REDIGE: Journal of Design, Innovation and Strategic Management is a SENAI / CETIQT quarterly electronic scientific publication, created in 2010. REDIGE is a bilingual multidisciplinary electronic publication, which publishes articles and essays by the national and international scientific community investigating issues of strategic interest for the development of the textile and apparel chain and of their intersections with other economic and industrial activities. (http://www.cetiqt.senai.br/ead/redige/index.php/redige/index)
